layers-editor-title: Title of the Layers editor interface shown on file pages
layers-toolbar-title: Accessibility label for the main editor toolbar
layers-editor-close: Label or tooltip for the close button in the Layers editor header
layers-editor-save: Label for the Save button in the editor toolbar
layers-editor-cancel: Label for the Cancel button in the editor toolbar
layers-error-init: Error shown if the client-side editor fails to initialize
layers-tool-text: Tool name for adding text layers
layers-tool-textbox: Tool name for drawing text box shapes (rectangle with multi-line text)
layers-tool-callout: Tool name for drawing callout/speech bubble shapes with a tail pointer
layers-tool-marker: Tool name for adding numbered/lettered sequence markers with optional arrows
layers-tool-dimension: Tool name for drawing dimension/measurement annotations with extension lines
layers-tool-pen: Tool name for freehand drawing (path) tool
layers-tool-arrow: Tool name for drawing arrow annotations
layers-tool-rectangle: Tool name for drawing rectangle shapes
layers-tool-circle: Tool name for drawing circle shapes
layers-tool-ellipse: Tool name for drawing ellipse shapes
layers-tool-polygon: Tool name for drawing polygon shapes
layers-tool-star: Tool name for drawing star shapes
layers-tool-line: Tool name for drawing straight lines
layers-tool-zoom: Tool name for zoom tool used to zoom in/out the canvas
layers-tool-group-text: Label for the text tools dropdown group in the toolbar
layers-tool-group-shapes: Label for the shape tools dropdown group in the toolbar
layers-tool-group-lines: Label for the line tools dropdown group in the toolbar
layers-tool-dropdown-hint: Hint text appended to dropdown trigger tooltip explaining more tools are available
layers-layer-name: Label for the layer name field in the layer panel
layers-layer-visible: Label for the visibility toggle of a layer
layers-layer-locked: Label for the locked toggle of a layer
layers-layer-locked-warning: Warning message shown when user tries to modify a locked layer
layers-add-layer: Button label to add a new layer
layers-delete-layer: Button label to delete a layer
layers-save-success: Notification message shown after layers are saved successfully
layers-saving: Status message shown while layers are being saved
layers-save-error: Error message shown when saving layers fails
layers-panel-subtitle: Helper text below the layers panel title
layers-empty: Message shown when there are no layers yet
layers-code-title: Heading for the wikitext code panel
layers-toggle-visibility: Tooltip text for toggling a layer's visibility
layers-toggle-lock: Tooltip text for toggling a layer's lock state
layers-background-layer: Label for the background image layer in the layer panel
layers-background-opacity: Label and tooltip for the background opacity slider
layers-background-visibility: Tooltip for the background visibility toggle button
layers-background-locked: Tooltip explaining that the background layer is always locked
layers-delete-layer-button: Tooltip text for deleting a layer
layers-delete-confirm: Confirmation dialog text before deleting a layer
layers-delete-folder-title: Title for the folder deletion dialog
layers-delete-folder-message: Message shown when deleting a folder with layers inside. $1 is the number of layers in the folder
layers-delete-folder-keep-children: Button label to delete the folder but keep its child layers
layers-delete-folder-delete-all: Button label to delete the folder and all layers inside it
layers-cancel-confirm: Confirmation dialog message shown when user tries to close the editor with unsaved changes
layers-cancel-continue: Button label in the unsaved changes dialog to continue editing instead of closing
layers-cancel-discard: Button label in the unsaved changes dialog to discard changes and close the editor
layers-no-layer-selected: Message shown when no layer is selected in the properties panel
layers-layer-not-found: Message shown when the selected layer cannot be found
layers-permission-denied: Error shown when the user lacks permission to edit layers
layers-not-file-page: Error shown when trying to open the editor on a non-file page
layers-file-not-found: Error shown when the target image file cannot be found
layers-undo: Tooltip or label for the Undo action
layers-redo: Tooltip or label for the Redo action
layers-delete-selected: Action label to delete currently selected layer(s)
layers-duplicate-selected: Action label to duplicate currently selected layer(s)
layers-prop-x: Property label for layer X position
layers-prop-y: Property label for layer Y position
layers-prop-start-x: Property label for line/arrow start X coordinate
layers-prop-start-y: Property label for line/arrow start Y coordinate
layers-prop-end-x: Property label for line/arrow end X coordinate
layers-prop-end-y: Property label for line/arrow end Y coordinate
layers-prop-text: Property label for layer text content
layers-prop-font-size: Property label for text font size
layers-prop-color: Property label for primary color (fill or stroke depending on tool)
layers-prop-text-color: Property label for text color in text box layers
layers-prop-text-stroke-width: Property label for text stroke (outline) width in text box layers
layers-prop-text-stroke-color: Property label for text stroke (outline) color in text box layers
layers-prop-text-align: Property label for horizontal text alignment in text boxes
layers-prop-vertical-align: Property label for vertical text alignment in text boxes
layers-prop-padding: Property label for padding inside text box layers
layers-align-left: Option label for left horizontal alignment
layers-align-center: Option label for center horizontal alignment
layers-align-right: Option label for right horizontal alignment
layers-align-top: Option label for top vertical alignment
layers-align-middle: Option label for middle vertical alignment
layers-align-bottom: Option label for bottom vertical alignment
layers-prop-fill-type: Property label for fill type selector (solid color or gradient)
layers-fill-solid: Option text for solid color fill type
layers-fill-linear: Option text for linear gradient fill type
layers-fill-radial: Option text for radial gradient fill type
layers-gradient-angle: Property label for linear gradient angle in degrees
layers-gradient-radius: Property label for radial gradient radius
layers-gradient-colors: Section label for gradient color stops editor
layers-gradient-add-stop: Tooltip for button to add a new color stop to the gradient
layers-gradient-remove-stop: Tooltip for button to remove a color stop from the gradient
layers-prop-radius: Property label for corner radius (rectangles) or general radius
layers-prop-corner-radius: Property label for rounded corner radius on rectangles
layers-prop-stroke-width: Property label for stroke width in pixels
layers-prop-line-width: Property label for line width in pixels (used for dimension tool lines)
layers-prop-opacity: Property label for layer opacity percentage
layers-prop-blend: Property label for layer blend/composite mode
layers-prop-blur-fill: Checkbox label for enabling blur fill mode (blurs background through shape instead of solid color fill)
layers-prop-blur-radius: Property label for the blur radius (in pixels) used by blur effect layers and blur fill
layers-prop-rotation: Property label for rotation angle in degrees
layers-prop-sides: Property label for number of sides for polygon shapes
layers-prop-points: Property label for number of points for star shapes
layers-prop-outer-radius: Property label for outer radius of star shapes
layers-prop-inner-radius: Property label for inner radius of star shapes (distance from center to inner points)
layers-prop-point-radius: Property label for corner radius at star points (outer tips)
layers-prop-valley-radius: Property label for corner radius at star valleys (inner corners between points)
layers-prop-arrow-ends: Property label for arrow ends style (single, double, or none)
layers-prop-head-type: Property label for arrow head shape type
layers-head-pointed: Arrow head type option with sharp pointed barbs
layers-head-chevron: Arrow head type option with square/chevron shaped barbs
layers-head-standard: Arrow head type option with rectangular barbs (straight-edged)
layers-prop-head-scale: Property label for arrow head scale factor (percentage slider)
layers-prop-tail-width: Property label for arrow tail width in pixels (creates tapered arrows)
layers-prop-arrow-size: Property label for arrow head size
layers-prop-tail-direction: Property label for callout tail direction (which side the speech bubble pointer is on)
layers-prop-tail-position: Property label for callout tail position along the edge (0-1 range)
layers-prop-tail-size: Property label for callout tail size in pixels
layers-prop-tail-style: Property label for callout tail style dropdown
layers-prop-marker-value: Property label for marker value (number, letter, or custom text like 1A, 1.1)
layers-prop-marker-value-placeholder: Placeholder text for marker value input showing example formats
layers-prop-marker-style: Property label for marker style dropdown (circled, parentheses, plain, letter)
layers-prop-marker-size: Property label for marker circle size in pixels
layers-prop-font-size-adjust: Property label for adjusting font size relative to marker size (-10 to +20)
layers-prop-marker-arrow: Property label for showing/hiding the marker arrow
layers-marker-name: Default name for marker layers. $1 is the marker number/letter value.
layers-marker-autonumber: Toolbar checkbox label for marker autonumber mode
layers-marker-autonumber-tooltip: Tooltip for marker autonumber checkbox explaining the feature
layers-marker-style-circled: Marker style option - number in a circle
layers-marker-style-parentheses: Marker style option - number in parentheses
layers-marker-style-plain: Marker style option - plain number with period
layers-marker-style-letter: Marker style option - letter sequence (A, B, C)
layers-marker-style-letter-circled: Marker style option - letter in a circle
layers-section-dimension: Section title for dimension tool properties panel
layers-prop-end-style: Property label for dimension line end marker style
layers-prop-text-position: Property label for dimension text position relative to line
layers-prop-extension-length: Property label for dimension extension line length in pixels
layers-prop-unit: Property label for measurement unit (px, cm, in, etc.)
layers-prop-scale: Property label for measurement scale factor (e.g., 1px = 1cm)
layers-prop-precision: Property label for decimal precision of measurement display
layers-prop-show-unit: Property label for checkbox to show/hide unit in measurement
layers-prop-dimension-value: Property label for the dimension value input (user enters the measurement)
layers-prop-dimension-value-placeholder: Placeholder text showing example dimension value format
layers-section-tolerance: Section header for dimension tolerance settings
layers-prop-tolerance-type: Property label for tolerance type dropdown
layers-prop-tolerance-value: Property label for symmetric tolerance value
layers-prop-tolerance-upper: Property label for upper tolerance limit
layers-prop-tolerance-lower: Property label for lower tolerance limit
layers-tolerance-none: Tolerance type option - no tolerance shown
layers-tolerance-deviation: Tolerance type option - deviation with separate upper/lower (e.g., +0.2/-0.1)
layers-tolerance-limits: Tolerance type option - min-max limits format (e.g., 10.3-10.7)
layers-tolerance-basic: Tolerance type option - basic/reference dimension with box (no tolerance)
layers-dimension-end-arrow: Dimension end style option - arrow markers
layers-dimension-end-tick: Dimension end style option - tick/slash marks
layers-dimension-end-dot: Dimension end style option - dot markers
layers-dimension-end-none: Dimension end style option - no markers
layers-dimension-text-above: Dimension text position option - above the dimension line
layers-dimension-text-below: Dimension text position option - below the dimension line
layers-dimension-text-center: Dimension text position option - centered on the dimension line with background
layers-prop-orientation: Property label for dimension orientation constraint
layers-dimension-orientation-free: Dimension orientation option - free angle, not constrained
layers-dimension-orientation-horizontal: Dimension orientation option - constrained to horizontal
layers-dimension-orientation-vertical: Dimension orientation option - constrained to vertical
layers-prop-marker-size: Property label for dimension marker/arrow size control
layers-prop-text-direction: Property label for dimension text direction/rotation
layers-dimension-text-direction-auto: Text direction option - follows the dimension line angle, kept upright
layers-dimension-text-direction-auto-rev: Text direction option - follows the dimension line angle but rotated 180 degrees
layers-dimension-text-direction-horizont: Text direction option - always horizontal regardless of line angle
layers-section-background: Section header for dimension text background options
layers-prop-show-background: Property label for toggle to show/hide text background
layers-prop-background-color: Property label for text background color picker
layers-section-measurement: Section header for dimension measurement settings (unit, precision)
layers-tail-style-triangle: Tail style option - classic triangular speech bubble pointer
layers-tail-style-curved: Tail style option - smooth curved tail using Bézier curves
layers-tail-style-line: Tail style option - simple line pointer to the tip
layers-tail-style-none: Tail style option - no tail, just a rounded rectangle
layers-tail-bottom-left: Tail direction option - bottom edge, towards left corner
layers-tail-bottom-right: Tail direction option - bottom edge, towards right corner
layers-tail-top-left: Tail direction option - top edge, towards left corner
layers-tail-top-right: Tail direction option - top edge, towards right corner
layers-effect-shadow-blur: Property label for shadow blur radius
layers-effect-shadow-spread: Property label for shadow spread distance
layers-effect-shadow-offset-x: Property label for horizontal shadow offset
layers-effect-shadow-offset-y: Property label for vertical shadow offset
layers-color-picker-title: Heading for the custom color picker dialog
layers-color-picker-standard: Subheading labeling the standard color swatch grid inside the color picker
layers-color-picker-saved: Subheading labeling the saved/custom color swatch grid inside the color picker
layers-color-picker-custom-section: Label for the manual custom color input field within the color picker
layers-color-picker-none: Label/tooltip for the transparent (no color) button
layers-color-picker-empty-slot: Tooltip for an empty saved-color slot in the color picker
layers-color-picker-cancel: Button label for canceling out of the color picker dialog
layers-color-picker-apply: Button label for applying the selected color in the picker dialog
layers-color-picker-transparent: Accessible label describing the transparent state of a color swatch/button
layers-color-picker-color-swatch: Accessible label template for swatch buttons; $1 is the color value
layers-color-picker-color-preview: Accessible label template for the color preview button; $1 is the color description
layers-color-picker-hex-input: Accessible label for the hex color text input field for keyboard accessibility
layers-color-picker-hex-placeholder: Placeholder text shown in the hex color input field indicating the expected format
layers-grab-area: Accessible label for the draggable grab area to move/select a layer
layers-keyboard-nav-hint: Hint text explaining keyboard navigation in the layer panel (arrow keys and Enter)
layers-layer-toggle-visibility-key: Keyboard shortcut hint for toggling layer visibility
layers-layer-toggle-lock-key: Keyboard shortcut hint for toggling layer lock
layers-section-transform: Section heading label for transform-related properties (position, rotation, scale)
layers-section-appearance: Section heading label for appearance-related properties (fill, stroke, opacity)
layers-section-effects: Section heading label for layer effects (shadow, glow, stroke)
layers-section-text: Section heading label for text-related properties in text box layers
layers-section-text-shadow: Section heading label for text shadow properties in text box layers
layers-section-alignment: Section heading label for text alignment properties in text box layers
layers-section-rich-text: Section heading label for rich text formatting properties (underline, strikethrough, highlight)
layers-section-callout: Section heading label for callout tail properties in speech bubble layers
layers-section-marker: Section heading label for marker properties in number marker layers
layers-prop-font-family: Label for font family dropdown selector
layers-prop-bold: Checkbox label for bold text formatting
layers-prop-italic: Checkbox label for italic text formatting
layers-prop-text-shadow: Checkbox label to enable text drop shadow effect
layers-prop-text-shadow-color: Label for text shadow color picker
layers-prop-text-shadow-blur: Label for text shadow blur radius input
layers-prop-text-shadow-offset-x: Label for text shadow horizontal offset input
layers-prop-text-shadow-offset-y: Label for text shadow vertical offset input
layers-prop-underline: Checkbox label for underline text formatting in properties panel
layers-prop-strikethrough: Checkbox label for strikethrough text formatting in properties panel
layers-prop-highlight: Checkbox label for highlight/background color text formatting in properties panel
layers-prop-highlight-color: Label for highlight color picker in properties panel
layers-arrow-none: Dropdown option label: line without arrowheads
layers-effects: Label for the effects section in the toolbar
layers-effect-shadow-enable: Tooltip for enabling drop shadow on text
layers-effect-shadow-color: Tooltip for selecting drop shadow color
layers-effect-shadow-toggle: Tooltip for toggling drop shadow effect on a layer
layers-effect-glow-toggle: Tooltip for toggling glow effect on a layer
layers-effect-stroke-toggle: Tooltip for toggling stroke effect on a layer
layers-align-left: Tooltip for align left button - aligns selected layers to their leftmost edge
layers-align-center-h: Tooltip for align center horizontal button - centers selected layers horizontally
layers-align-right: Tooltip for align right button - aligns selected layers to their rightmost edge
layers-align-top: Tooltip for align top button - aligns selected layers to their topmost edge
layers-align-center-v: Tooltip for align center vertical button - centers selected layers vertically
layers-align-bottom: Tooltip for align bottom button - aligns selected layers to their bottommost edge
layers-distribute-h: Tooltip for distribute horizontally button - spaces selected layers evenly left to right
layers-distribute-v: Tooltip for distribute vertically button - spaces selected layers evenly top to bottom
layers-alignment-group: Label for the alignment toolbar group containing align and distribute buttons
layers-arrange-menu: Tooltip for the Arrange dropdown button in the toolbar
layers-snap-options: Section header in the Arrange dropdown for snap-related toggles
layers-smart-guides: Label for the Smart Guides toggle - snaps objects to other objects during drag
layers-smart-guides-desc: Description text for the Smart Guides toggle
layers-canvas-snap: Label for the Canvas Snap toggle - snaps objects to canvas edges and center during drag
layers-canvas-snap-desc: Description text for the Canvas Snap toggle
layers-align-section: Section header in the Arrange dropdown for alignment options, indicates 2+ layers required
layers-distribute-section: Section header in the Arrange dropdown for distribute options, indicates 3+ layers required
layers-toggle-background: Tooltip/label for toggling background image visibility
layers-toggle-rulers: Tooltip for toggling rulers along the top/left edges of the canvas
layers-toggle-guides: Tooltip for toggling visibility of draggable alignment guides
layers-toggle-snap-grid: Tooltip for toggling snapping of objects to the grid
layers-toggle-snap-guides: Tooltip for toggling snapping of objects to alignment guides
layers-save-changes: Tooltip text on Save button indicating it saves changes
layers-cancel-changes: Tooltip text on Cancel button indicating it discards changes
layers-keyboard-shortcuts: Button label and tooltip for showing keyboard shortcuts help dialog
layers-keyboard-shortcuts-tooltip: Tooltip for the keyboard shortcuts button, includes the shortcut key
layers-shortcuts-dialog-title: Title shown in the keyboard shortcuts help dialog
layers-shortcuts-dialog-close: Close button label in the keyboard shortcuts dialog
layers-shortcut-select-all: Keyboard shortcut action description for selecting all layers
layers-shortcut-deselect: Keyboard shortcut action description for deselecting or canceling
layers-shortcut-zoom: Keyboard shortcut action description for zooming in or out
layers-shortcut-copy: Keyboard shortcut action description for copying selected layers
layers-shortcut-cut: Keyboard shortcut action description for cutting selected layers
layers-shortcut-paste: Keyboard shortcut action description for pasting layers from clipboard
layers-shortcut-group: Keyboard shortcut action description for grouping selected layers into a folder
layers-shortcut-ungroup: Keyboard shortcut action description for ungrouping a folder
layers-shortcut-smart-guides: Keyboard shortcut action description for toggling smart guides (snap to objects)
layers-shortcut-show-help: Keyboard shortcut action description for showing the keyboard shortcuts dialog
layers-blend-blur: Blend mode option: blur fill effect - blurs everything below within the shape, preserving stroke and text content
layers-code-none: Message in code panel when no layers are visible
layers-code-enable: Helper text in code panel prompting to enable layers
layers-code-all-visible: Label preceding code snippet when all layers are visible
layers-code-selected-visible: Label preceding code snippet when some layers are visible
layers-code-caption: Placeholder caption text used in code examples
layers-code-copy: Button label to copy wikitext code
layers-code-copied: Notification shown after copying code succeeds
layers-code-copy-failed: Notification shown after copying code fails
layers-status-tool: Status bar label for the currently active tool
layers-status-zoom: Status bar label for the current zoom level
layers-status-pos: Status bar label for the mouse cursor position
layers-status-size: Status bar label for the selected layer dimensions
layers-status-selection: Status bar label for the number of selected layers
layers-status-region: ARIA label for the status bar region
layers-skip-to-toolbar: Skip link text to jump to the toolbar for keyboard users
layers-skip-to-canvas: Skip link text to jump to the canvas for keyboard users
layers-skip-to-layers: Skip link text to jump to the layers panel for keyboard users
layers-toolbar-region: ARIA label for the toolbar navigation region
layers-main-region: ARIA label for the main editor workspace region
layers-panel-region: ARIA label for the layers panel complementary region
layers-canvas-region: ARIA label for the drawing canvas region
layers-loading: Loading message shown during API requests
layers-default-text-prefix: Default prefix for auto-naming text layers
layers-default-empty: Default name used when a layer is empty
layers-type-rectangle: Generic type label for rectangle layers
layers-type-textbox: Generic type label for text box layers (rectangle with multi-line text)
layers-type-circle: Generic type label for circle layers
layers-type-ellipse: Generic type label for ellipse layers
layers-type-polygon: Generic type label for polygon layers
layers-type-star: Generic type label for star layers
layers-type-arrow: Generic type label for arrow layers
layers-type-line: Generic type label for line layers
layers-type-path: Generic type label for freehand path layers
layers-type-layer: Fallback generic type label for layers
layers-type-group: Type label for group layers that contain multiple child layers
layers-type-folder: Type label for folder layers that can contain child layers
layers-expand-group: Tooltip/aria-label for button to expand a collapsed folder
layers-collapse-group: Tooltip/aria-label for button to collapse an expanded folder
layers-create-group: Tooltip/aria-label for button to create a folder. Mentions keyboard shortcut.
layers-create-folder: Tooltip/aria-label for button to create a folder
layers-add-folder: Button label for adding a new folder
layers-folder-created: Success notification shown after creating an empty folder
layers-folder-created-with-layers: Success notification shown after creating a folder with layers inside
layers-folder-failed: Error notification shown when folder creation fails
layers-folder-unavailable: Error shown when folder feature is not available
layers-folder-drop-hint: Hint shown when dragging a layer over a folder
layers-folder-contents: Label for the folder contents info in properties panel
layers-folder-empty-hint: Message shown for empty folders suggesting to drag layers
layers-folder-empty-tip: Tip text shown in properties panel when an empty folder is selected
layers-folder-layer-count: Shows count of layers in folder. $1 is the number of layers
layers-folder-expanded: Checkbox label for folder expanded state
layers-move-to-folder: Context menu item for moving a layer into a folder
layers-remove-from-folder: Context menu item for removing a layer from a folder
layers-group-created: Success notification shown after creating a folder
layers-group-failed: Error notification shown when folder creation fails
layers-group-select-multiple: Warning shown when user tries to create a group without selecting at least 2 layers
layers-group-unavailable: Error shown when folder feature is not available
layers-ungrouped: Success notification shown after removing a folder
layers-context-group: Context menu item for creating a folder. Includes keyboard shortcut.
layers-context-ungroup: Context menu item for ungrouping a folder. Includes keyboard shortcut.
layers-context-rename: Context menu item for renaming a layer
layers-context-duplicate: Context menu item for duplicating selected layers
layers-context-delete: Context menu item for deleting selected layers
layers-panel-subtitle-updated: Updated subtitle text for the layers panel explaining double-click to rename
layers-panel-expand: Accessibility label for button to expand the collapsed layer panel on mobile
layers-panel-collapse: Accessibility label for button to collapse the layer panel on mobile
layers-aria-layer-added: Screen reader announcement when a layer is added to the layer list
layers-aria-layer-removed: Screen reader announcement when a layer is removed from the layer list
layers-aria-layer-count: Screen reader announcement for total layer count. $1 is the number of layers.
layers-aria-layer-reordered: Screen reader announcement when a layer is reordered in the list
layers-data-too-large: Error shown when the layer JSON payload exceeds a configured byte size limit. $1 is the byte limit.
layers-invalid-data: Error shown when the posted layer JSON fails validation
layers-load-error: Error shown when loading existing layer data fails
layers-background-load-error: Warning shown when the background image fails to load; reassures user they can still annotate
layers-unsaved-cancel-confirm: Confirmation message shown when user tries to cancel with unsaved changes
layers-no-layers: Message shown when no layers exist yet for the image
layers-rate-limited: Error shown when user hits rate limits saving or rendering
layers-session-expired: Error shown when the user's session has expired and they need to refresh the page
layers-network-error: Error shown when a network connection problem occurs during an API request
layers-timeout-error: Error shown when an API request exceeds the timeout limit
layers-invalid-filename: Error shown when the provided filename is invalid or unsafe
layers-invalid-slidename: Error shown when the provided slide name contains invalid characters. Slide names must be alphanumeric with hyphens and underscores only.
layers-too-many-layers: Error shown when a save attempts to include too many layers
layers-too-complex: Error shown when the calculated complexity exceeds a safe threshold
layers-image-too-large: Error shown when the source image exceeds configured width/height budgets for editing
layers-db-error: Generic database error; $1 contains a brief error detail
layers-save-failed: Generic save failure message when DB insert/update fails
layers-layerset-not-found: Error shown when a requested layer set id does not exist
layers-max-sets-reached: Error shown when user tries to create a new named layer set but the maximum number of sets per image has been reached
layers-invalid-setname: Error shown when the provided set name contains invalid characters
layers-delete: Button text for the delete confirmation dialog
layers-delete-set: Button text for deleting a layer set
layers-delete-set-tooltip: Tooltip for the delete set button
layers-delete-set-confirm: Confirmation dialog message when deleting a layer set. $1 is the set name.
layers-delete-set-success: Success notification after deleting a layer set. $1 is the set name, $2 is the number of revisions deleted.
layers-confirm-delete-title: Title for the confirmation dialog when deleting a layer set
layers-confirm-clear-title: Title for the confirmation dialog when clearing all layers from a set
layers-delete-failed: Error shown when layer set deletion fails
layers-delete-permission-denied: Error shown when user lacks permission to delete a layer set (not owner or admin)
layers-delete-default-set: Error shown when user tries to delete the default layer set which is not allowed
layers-clear-default-set-confirm: Confirmation dialog when user wants to clear all layers from the default set
layers-default-set-cleared: Success message after clearing all layers from the default set
layers-no-layers-to-clear: Message shown when trying to clear a set that has no layers
apihelp-layersdelete-example-1: API help example for the layersdelete action
layers-rename-set: Button text for renaming a layer set
layers-rename-set-tooltip: Tooltip for the rename set button
layers-rename-set-prompt: Prompt message asking user to enter new name for a layer set
layers-rename-set-success: Success notification after renaming a layer set. $1 is old name, $2 is new name.
layers-rename-failed: Error shown when layer set rename fails
layers-reload-warning: Warning shown when layer list reload fails after a successful operation
layers-rename-permission-denied: Error shown when user lacks permission to rename a layer set (not owner or admin)
layers-cannot-rename-default: Error shown when user tries to rename the default layer set which is not allowed
layers-cannot-rename-to-default: Error shown when user tries to rename a set to 'default' which is reserved
layers-setname-exists: Error shown when trying to rename to a name that already exists
apihelp-layersrename-example-1: API help example for the layersrename action
layers-export-image: Button text for exporting the annotated image as PNG
layers-export-image-tooltip: Tooltip for the export as PNG button
layers-export-success: Success notification after exporting an image
layers-export-failed: Error shown when image export fails
layers-import-image: Button text for importing an image as a layer
layers-import-image-tooltip: Tooltip for the import image button
layers-import-image-too-large: Error shown when the selected image file exceeds the configured size limit ($wgLayersMaxImageBytes)
layers-import-image-invalid-type: Error shown when the selected file is not a valid image type
layers-import-image-failed: Error shown when importing an image fails
layers-set-name-label: Label for the set name input field in the editor UI
layers-set-name-default: Default name for layer sets when no name is provided
layers-set-label: Label for the layer set dropdown selector in the editor header
layers-set-default: Display name for the default layer set in the dropdown
layers-set-new: Button text for creating a new layer set
layers-set-new-tooltip: Tooltip text for the new set button
layers-set-name-placeholder: Placeholder text for the new set name input field
layers-set-name-required: Warning shown when user tries to create set without entering a name
layers-set-name-invalid: Error shown when the entered set name contains invalid characters
layers-set-name-exists: Error shown when trying to create a set with a name that already exists
layers-set-limit-reached: Error shown when the maximum number of sets has been reached. $1 is the maximum number.
layers-set-created: Success notification shown after creating a new set. $1 is the set name.
layers-set-auto-created: Notification shown when a layer set is automatically created via deep link. $1 is the set name.
layers-set-create-error: Error shown when set creation fails
layers-set-loaded: Success notification shown after loading a set. $1 is the set name.
layers-set-load-error: Error shown when loading a set fails
layers-set-revision-single: Text shown in set dropdown when a set has exactly one revision
layers-set-revision-plural: Text shown in set dropdown when a set has multiple revisions. $1 is the count.
layers-set-new-unsaved: Text shown in set dropdown for a new layer set that hasn't been saved yet
layers-unsaved-changes-warning: Confirmation dialog shown when switching sets with unsaved changes
layers-unsaved-changes-title: Dialog title for unsaved changes confirmation
layers-switch-anyway: Button text to confirm switching sets despite unsaved changes
layers-set-selector-group: ARIA label for the layer set selector group container
layers-set-select-aria: ARIA label for the layer set dropdown selector
layers-new-set-placeholder: Placeholder text for the new set name input field
layers-new-set-aria: ARIA label for the new set name input field
layers-new-set-create: Button text for creating a new layer set
layers-new-set-create-aria: ARIA label for the create new set button
layers-new-set-name-required: Warning shown when trying to create a set without entering a name
layers-new-set-created: Success notification after creating a new set. $1 is the set name.
layers-revision-group: ARIA label for the revision selector group container
layers-revision-select-aria: ARIA label for the revision dropdown selector
layers-revision-load-aria: ARIA label for the load revision button
layers-switch-set-unsaved-confirm: Confirmation dialog when switching sets with unsaved changes
layers-security-violation: Error shown when malicious or dangerous content is detected in layer data
layers-invalid-layer-type: Error shown when an unsupported layer type is encountered. $1 is the invalid type name.
layers-invalid-coordinates: Error shown when layer coordinate data is malformed or out of bounds
layers-json-parse-error: Error shown when layer JSON data cannot be parsed
layers-permission-create-denied: Error shown when user lacks permission to create layer assets
layers-permission-manage-denied: Error shown when user lacks permission to manage the layer library
layers-imagemagick-error: Error shown when server-side image processing fails. $1 contains the error detail.
layers-file-write-error: Error shown when writing layer data to the file system fails
layers-cache-error: Error shown when layer cache operations fail
layers-concurrent-edit-detected: Warning shown when another user has modified the same layer set concurrently
layers-invalid-revision: Error shown when an invalid revision number is specified
layers-revision-load-failed: Error shown when loading a specific revision fails. $1 is the revision number.
layers-revision-reload-failed: Warning shown when refreshing the revision list after a save fails
layers-backup-created: Notification shown when an automatic backup revision is created
layers-recovery-mode: Warning shown when the editor enters recovery mode due to errors
layers-browser-compatibility: Warning shown when the user's browser may not support all features
layers-confirm-title: Generic dialog title used for confirmation prompts
layers-confirm-yes: Confirmation dialog button label to accept an action
layers-confirm-no: Confirmation dialog button label to cancel an action
layers-confirm: Generic confirm button label used in confirmation dialogs
layers-cancel: Generic cancel button label used in confirmation dialogs
layers-alert-title: Generic dialog title used for alerts/notices
layers-alert-ok: Alert dialog button label to dismiss
layers-progress-title: Title shown on progress/processing indicator dialogs
layers-error-api: Generic error shown when the API save request fails
layers-error-canvas: Generic error shown when a canvas rendering or drawing operation fails on the client
layers-error-validation: Generic error shown when user input fails validation
layers-error-load: Generic error shown when loading layer data from the server fails
layers-error-save: Generic error shown when saving layer data fails
layers-error-render: Generic error shown when a render operation fails (client or server)
layers-error-general: Fallback generic error shown for unexpected failures
layers-revision-label: Label for the revision history selector in the editor header
layers-revision-load: Button text to load the selected revision into the editor
layers-revision-latest: Option label indicating the latest/current revision
layers-revision-loaded: Notification shown after a revision is loaded into the editor
layers-revision-load-error: Error shown if a revision fails to load into the editor
layers-revision-not-found: Warning shown if a selected revision id is not found in the history list
layers-revision-already-current: Notification shown when the user tries to load the currently loaded revision again
layers-revision-current-suffix: Suffix appended to the label of the current revision in the selector
layers-revision-by: Suffix used in revision labels to show the author. $1 is the user name.
right-editlayers: User right: allows editing image layers and creating new layer sets
right-managelayerlibrary: User right: allows managing the shared layer asset library
action-editlayers: Action description shown on Special:ListUsers and other UI for the editlayers right
action-managelayerlibrary: Action description shown on Special:ListUsers and other UI for the managelayerlibrary right
echo-badge-count: Fallback message bundled here to satisfy structure tests when Echo/Minerva messages are unavailable.
templatedata-doc-subpage: Fallback for TemplateData's documentation-subpage label so Minerva/Skin ResourceLoader bundles have a translation even when TemplateData isn't enabled in this test environment.
layers-transparent: Label used where a color swatch/button indicates a transparent (no color) state.
layers-export: Button label to export the current layers as a JSON file
layers-export-error: Error message displayed when JSON export fails
layers-export-layers: Button label for exporting layers to a JSON file (alternative text for export button)
layers-import: Button label to import layers from a JSON file
layers-import-success: Notification shown when an import completes successfully
layers-import-error: Notification shown when an import fails
layers-import-unsaved-confirm: Confirmation dialog shown if there are unsaved changes before importing
layers-import-layers: Button label for importing layers from a JSON file (alternative text for import button)
layers-revision-name-placeholder: Placeholder text for the optional revision name input shown in the editor header before saving
layers-load-revision-unsaved-confirm: Confirmation shown when loading a different revision while there are unsaved changes in the editor
layers-validation-layer-invalid: Validation: shown when a layer object is missing or not an object
layers-validation-type-invalid: Validation: layer.type not in whitelist; $1 is the invalid type
layers-validation-id-type: Validation: layer.id must be a string
layers-validation-id-too-long: Validation: layer.id length exceeded; $1 is max length
layers-validation-id-invalid-chars: Validation: layer.id failed allowed characters regex
layers-validation-coordinate-invalid: Validation: coordinate field not a valid number; $1 is the field name
layers-validation-coordinate-too-large: Validation: coordinate absolute value too large; $1 is field name, $2 is max
layers-validation-fontsize-invalid: Validation: fontSize not a valid number
layers-validation-fontsize-range: Validation: fontSize out of allowed range; $1 min, $2 max
layers-validation-strokewidth-invalid: Validation: strokeWidth not a valid number
layers-validation-strokewidth-range: Validation: strokeWidth out of allowed range; $1 min, $2 max
layers-validation-opacity-invalid: Validation: opacity not a valid number
layers-validation-opacity-range: Validation: opacity out of allowed range; $1 min, $2 max
layers-validation-sides-range: Validation: sides out of allowed range; $1 min, $2 max
layers-validation-blurradius-invalid: Validation: blurRadius not a valid number
layers-validation-blurradius-range: Validation: blurRadius out of allowed range; $1 min, $2 max
layers-validation-text-type: Validation: text must be a string
layers-validation-text-too-long: Validation: text length exceeded; $1 max characters
layers-validation-text-unsafe: Validation: text contains potentially unsafe patterns
layers-validation-fontfamily-type: Validation: fontFamily must be a string
layers-validation-fontfamily-too-long: Validation: fontFamily length exceeded; $1 is max
layers-validation-textalign-invalid: Validation: textAlign not in allowed values
layers-validation-color-invalid: Validation: color field invalid; $1 is the field name
layers-validation-gradient-invalid: Validation: gradient must be an object
layers-validation-gradient-type-invalid: Validation: gradient type must be linear or radial
layers-validation-gradient-colors-requir: Validation: gradient needs at least 2 color stops
layers-validation-gradient-colors-max: Validation: gradient has too many color stops; $1 is max
layers-validation-gradient-stop-invalid: Validation: gradient color stop is invalid; $1 is index
layers-validation-gradient-offset-invali: Validation: gradient stop offset out of range; $1 is index
layers-validation-gradient-color-invalid: Validation: gradient stop color is invalid; $1 is index
layers-validation-gradient-angle-invalid: Validation: gradient angle out of 0-360 range
layers-validation-gradient-centerx-inval: Validation: gradient centerX out of 0-1 range
layers-validation-gradient-centery-inval: Validation: gradient centerY out of 0-1 range
layers-validation-gradient-radius-invali: Validation: gradient radius out of 0-2 range
layers-validation-points-array: Validation: points must be an array
layers-validation-points-too-many: Validation: points array too long; $1 is max length
layers-validation-point-invalid: Validation: a points entry is not an object; $1 is index
layers-validation-point-coordinates: Validation: a points entry lacks valid x/y; $1 is index
layers-validation-point-too-large: Validation: a points entry exceeds coordinate bounds; $1 is index
layers-validation-star-points-invalid: Validation: star point count must be an integer
layers-validation-star-points-range: Validation: star point count outside allowed range; $1 min, $2 max
layers-validation-arrowstyle-invalid: Validation: arrowStyle not in allowed values
layers-validation-blendmode-invalid: Validation: blend mode not in allowed values
layers-validation-layers-array: Validation: layers must be an array
layers-validation-too-many-layers: Validation: total number of layers exceeds limit; $1 is max
layers-validation-layer-error: Validation: prefix used to annotate which layer in list had an error; $1 is 1-based index, $2 is the error text
layers-validation-duplicate-id: Validation: two layers share the same id; $1 is the duplicate id
layers-validation-richtext-not-array: Validation: rich text property must be an array of styled text runs
layers-validation-richtext-too-many-runs: Validation: too many text formatting runs in rich text; $1 is the maximum allowed
layers-validation-richtext-too-long: Validation: total text content in rich text exceeds maximum length
layers-validation-failed: Validation: shown when layer validation fails with a specific error message. $1 is the detailed error text.
layers-presets: Label for the presets dropdown button in the toolbar
layers-presets-tooltip: Tooltip shown when hovering over the presets button
layers-presets-not-supported: Tooltip shown when presets are not available for the current tool
layers-presets-none: Message shown in dropdown when no presets exist for the current tool
layers-presets-save-current: Button label for saving the current tool style as a new preset
layers-presets-enter-name: Prompt text asking user to enter a name for a new preset
layers-presets-saved: Notification shown after successfully saving a preset. $1 is the preset name.
layers-presets-name-exists: Error message when trying to save a preset with a name that already exists. $1 is the existing preset name.
layers-presets-default: Tooltip for the star icon indicating the default preset
layers-presets-set-default: Tooltip for button to set a preset as the default
layers-presets-delete: Tooltip for button to delete a user-created preset
layers-presets-confirm-delete: Confirmation dialog text when deleting a preset. $1 is the preset name.
layers-presets-import: Button label for importing presets from a file
layers-presets-export: Button label for exporting presets to a file
layers-presets-manage: Button label for opening the preset management dialog
layers-presets-save-title: Title for the save preset dialog
layers-presets-name-placeholder: Placeholder text for the preset name input field
layers-ok: Generic OK button label used in dialogs
layers-link-editor-title: Title attribute for links that open the layers editor when clicked
layers-link-editor-newtab-title: Title attribute for links that open the layers editor in a new browser tab
layers-link-editor-modal-title: Title attribute for links that open the layers editor in a modal overlay
layers-link-viewer-title: Title attribute for links that open the full-size viewer with layers when clicked
layers-editor-modal-title: Accessible title for the modal dialog containing the layers editor
layers-editor-modal-close: Label for the close button on the modal editor overlay
layers-editor-modal-saved: Status message shown when layers are saved from the modal editor
layers-lightbox-close: Label for the close button in the layers lightbox viewer
layers-lightbox-close-tooltip: Tooltip for the close button in the layers lightbox viewer
layers-lightbox-loading: Loading message shown while the lightbox is fetching layer data
layers-viewer-overlay-label: Accessible label for the hover overlay toolbar on images with layers
layers-viewer-edit: Tooltip for the edit button in the viewer overlay (opens layer editor)
layers-viewer-view: Tooltip for the view button in the viewer overlay (opens full size view)
apihelp-layersinfo-summary: Short summary shown on Special:ApiHelp describing what layersinfo does
apihelp-layersinfo-param-filename: Parameter documentation string for the filename parameter of layersinfo
apihelp-layersinfo-param-layersetid: Parameter documentation string for the optional layersetid parameter
apihelp-layersinfo-param-setname: Parameter documentation string for the optional setname parameter to retrieve a specific named layer set
apihelp-layersinfo-param-limit: Parameter documentation string for the optional limit parameter that caps the number of returned layer sets
apihelp-layersinfo-param-offset: Parameter documentation for the optional offset parameter used to skip a number of revisions
apihelp-layersinfo-param-continue: Parameter documentation for the continuation token returned when additional results are available
apihelp-layersinfo-example-1: API help example showing how to request the latest layer set for an image via action=layersinfo
apihelp-layersinfo-example-2: API help example demonstrating specifying a particular layer set id for action=layersinfo
apihelp-layerssave-summary: Short summary shown on Special:ApiHelp describing what layerssave does
apihelp-layerssave-param-filename: Parameter documentation string for the filename parameter of layerssave
apihelp-layerssave-param-data: Parameter documentation string for the data payload parameter
apihelp-layerssave-param-setname: Parameter documentation string for the optional setname parameter
apihelp-layerssave-param-token: Parameter documentation string for the CSRF token parameter
apihelp-layerssave-example-1: API help example for saving layers with action=layerssave; includes required filename, data JSON, and CSRF token
layers-filepage-section-title: Title for the collapsible section on File: pages listing available layer annotation sets
layers-filepage-set-name: Table header for the set name column in the File page layer sets list
layers-filepage-author: Table header for the author/creator column in the File page layer sets list
layers-filepage-revisions: Table header for the revision count column in the File page layer sets list
layers-filepage-last-modified: Table header for the last modified date column in the File page layer sets list
layers-filepage-edit: Link text for editing a layer set from the File page list
layers-filepage-view: Link text for viewing/previewing a layer set from the File page list
layers-filepage-usage-hint: Hint text shown below the layer sets table explaining wikitext syntax to display layers
special-editslide-title: Page title for the Special:EditSlide page. $1 is the slide name.
layers-slide-disabled: Error message when slides feature is disabled in configuration
layers-slide-name-required: Error message when slide name is not provided in parser function
layers-slide-invalid-name: Error message when slide name contains invalid characters
layers-slide-error-generic: Generic error message when slide rendering fails due to an unexpected error
layers-slide-empty: Message displayed when a slide has no content (e.g., 'This slide is empty')
layers-slide-empty-hint: Hint shown below the empty message to guide users on how to add content
layers-slide-properties: Title for the slide properties panel in the editor sidebar
layers-slide-prop-name: Label for the slide name field in the properties panel
layers-slide-prop-size: Label for the slide size (width/height) section in the properties panel
layers-slide-prop-background: Label for the background color section in the properties panel
layers-slide-copy-embed: Button text for copying the slide embed wikitext code
layers-slide-canvas-layer: Name shown for the canvas/background layer in the layer panel for slides
layers-slide-background: Label for the background color input in the create slide form
layers-slide-change-color: Tooltip for clicking to change background color
layers-shape-library-title: Dialog title for the shape library browser panel
layers-shape-library-search: Placeholder text for the search input in the shape library
layers-shape-library-count: Text showing the number of shapes in a category. $1 is the count.
layers-shape-library-empty: Message shown when no shapes match the search query
layers-shape-library-not-loaded: Error shown when the shape library module is not available
layers-shape-library-button: Button label for opening the shape library
layers-shape-library-tooltip: Tooltip for the shape library button
layers-emoji-picker-title: Dialog title for the emoji picker panel
layers-emoji-picker-button: Button label for opening the emoji picker
layers-emoji-picker-tooltip: Tooltip for the emoji picker button
layers-emoji-search-placeholder: Placeholder text for the search input in the emoji picker
layers-emoji-no-results: Message shown when no emoji match the search query
layers-emoji-not-loaded: Error shown when the emoji library module is not available
layers-emoji-load-error: Error message when an emoji SVG fails to load
layers-close: Generic close button label used in dialogs
layers-text-toolbar-drag: Tooltip for the drag handle on the floating text formatting toolbar
layers-text-toolbar-font: Tooltip for the font family dropdown in the text toolbar
layers-text-toolbar-size: Tooltip for the font size input in the text toolbar
layers-text-toolbar-bold: Tooltip for the bold toggle button in the text toolbar, includes keyboard shortcut
layers-text-toolbar-italic: Tooltip for the italic toggle button in the text toolbar, includes keyboard shortcut
layers-text-toolbar-underline: Tooltip for the underline toggle button in the text toolbar (rich text mode only), includes keyboard shortcut
layers-text-toolbar-strikethrough: Tooltip for the strikethrough toggle button in the text toolbar (rich text mode only)
layers-text-toolbar-highlight: Tooltip for the text highlight/background color button in the text toolbar (rich text mode only)
layers-text-toolbar-highlight-color: Tooltip for the dropdown arrow to open the highlight color picker in the text toolbar
layers-text-toolbar-align-left: Tooltip for the left alignment button in the text toolbar
layers-text-toolbar-align-center: Tooltip for the center alignment button in the text toolbar
layers-text-toolbar-align-right: Tooltip for the right alignment button in the text toolbar
layers-text-toolbar-valign-top: Tooltip for the vertical top alignment button in the text toolbar
layers-text-toolbar-valign-middle: Tooltip for the vertical middle alignment button in the text toolbar
layers-text-toolbar-valign-bottom: Tooltip for the vertical bottom alignment button in the text toolbar
layers-text-toolbar-color: Tooltip for the text color picker in the text toolbar
layers-text-input-placeholder: Placeholder text for the text input modal dialog
layers-btn-ok: Generic OK button text used in modal dialogs
layers-draft-recovery-title: Title for the draft recovery confirmation dialog
layers-draft-recovery-message: Message asking user whether to recover unsaved changes. $1 is the timestamp, $2 is the number of layers
layers-draft-recover: Button label to recover the draft
layers-draft-discard: Button label to discard the draft
layers-draft-recovered: Notification message shown after successfully recovering a draft
layers-search-placeholder: Placeholder text for the layer search input
layers-search-clear: Tooltip for the button that clears the search filter
layers-search-results: Status text showing filtered layer count. $1 is visible count, $2 is total count
special-slides: Name of the Special:Slides page shown in the page title
special-slides-desc: Description of the Special:Slides page shown on Special:SpecialPages
special-slides-create: Button label to create a new slide
special-slides-create-and-edit: Button label to create a slide and immediately open it for editing
special-slides-create-title: Title shown when creating a new slide. $1 is the slide name
special-slides-create-failed: Error message shown when slide creation fails
special-slides-not-found-create: Message shown when a slide doesn't exist but can be created. $1 is the slide name
special-slides-search: Placeholder text for the slide search input
special-slides-sort-name: Sort option label for sorting by slide name
special-slides-sort-modified: Sort option label for sorting by last modified date
special-slides-sort-created: Sort option label for sorting by creation date
special-slides-loading: Loading indicator text shown while slides are being fetched
special-slides-empty: Message shown when no slides exist yet
special-slides-error: Error message shown when loading slides fails
special-slides-layers: Status text showing layer count. $1 is the number of layers. Uses PLURAL
special-slides-modified-by: Status text showing modification info. $1 is the formatted date, $2 is the user name
special-slides-edit: Button label to edit a slide
special-slides-delete: Button label to delete a slide
special-slides-delete-confirm: Confirmation message for deleting a slide. $1 is the slide name
special-slides-deleted: Success notification after deleting a slide. $1 is the slide name
special-slides-delete-failed: Error message shown when slide deletion fails
special-slides-count: Pagination status text. $1 is start index, $2 is end index, $3 is total count
special-slides-prev: Previous page button label for pagination
special-slides-next: Next page button label for pagination
special-slides-just-now: Relative time text for very recent modifications
special-slides-minutes-ago: Relative time text for minutes ago. $1 is the number of minutes. Uses PLURAL
special-slides-hours-ago: Relative time text for hours ago. $1 is the number of hours. Uses PLURAL
special-slides-days-ago: Relative time text for days ago. $1 is the number of days. Uses PLURAL
layers-slide-name: Label for the slide name input field
layers-slide-name-hint: Helper text explaining valid characters for slide names
specialpages-group-layers: Name of the special pages group for Layers extension pages on Special:SpecialPages
